original_title: Afsan’s Long Day (The Young Man Was, Part 2)
overview: Exploring the revolutionary left in 1970s Bangladesh through a series of inter-connected vignettes, which draw on Jean-Paul Sartre, Joschka Fischer, Rote Armee Fraktion, and the Sarbahara Party.
title: Afsan’s Long Day (The Young Man Was, Part 2)
